file.name: responses-object-response-with-headers.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Response Components with Headers
paths:
  /user:
    get:
      summary: View the current User
      responses:
        '200':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UserResponse'
components:
  responses:
    UserResponse:
      description: A user
      headers:
        X-Rate-Limit-Limit:
          $ref: '#/components/headers/X-Rate-Limit-Limit'
  headers:
    X-Rate-Limit-Limit:
      description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: responses: "UserResponse": headers: header "X-Rate-Limit-Limit": at 1:48: parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
